Configuration.Name: ChangeYourStatus
Configuration.Author: Bill Jones, IDS Project
Configuration.Description: This Server Level Addon allows a user to Select Transactions with a specific status and location value and route those transactions to a new queue.

Setting.name: chooseprocesstype
Setting.Description: This setting value allows you to choose what ProcessType you are looking to make a change to.

Setting.name: choosestatus
Setting.Description: This setting value allows you to choose what TransactionStatus you are looking to make a change to.

Setting.name: locationvalue
Setting.Description: Only transactions that have this value set in Location will be modified by the Addon.

Setting.name: changestatus
Setting.Description: This setting value allows you to choose the value to change TransactionStatus to. A new queue will be created if one does not exist.

Setting.name: changeprocess
Setting.Description: This setting value allows you to choose the value to change ProcessType to.
